author: The Hindu Net Desk
title: Morning digest: Officials of Tablighi Jamaat charged with defying restrictions, U.S. coronavirus death toll surpasses China's, and more
description: A select list of stories to read before you start your day
content: With at least 24 of its occupants testing positive for the novel coronavirus, an Islamic centre in the national capital has turned out to be the latest hotspot of COVID-19. More than 400 people with symptoms were admitted to different hospitals and over 1,100… [+7456 chars]
